actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Select Revenue Measures.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the operation of a lawyer referral service by a State or local bar association shall not be treated as an unrelated trade or business.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the operation of a lawyer referral service by a State or local bar association shall not be treated as an unrelated trade or business for tax-exemption purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the operation of a lawyer referral service by a State or local bar association shall not be treated as an unrelated trade or business.
